Easter Shopping Day at Hotel Chocolat

There\'s no Easter quite like one created by Hotel Chocolat, and this year is no different. If you drop by the store on Thursday 26 March you\'ll find chocolate tasting, a competition to win a €50 hamper as well as an exclusive 15% discount.\n\n While you\'re there why not browse their selection of fun Easter gifts and treats - ideal for parties, games and celebrating the season.

Buying a present? Whiteley Gift Card really is the perfect gift of choice.\n\n Gift card amounts range from €5 up to €500 and you will be able to use the Gift Cards in all shops at Drakes Circus with the exception of: EE, Fuel, Juice, Spudulike, Regus Express and Jack Wills Pop up store.

Whiteley is located just one mile from Junction 9 on the M27.

After exiting the motorway, follow the signs for \'shopping centre\'.

If you are using a GPS or route finder system, enter PO15 7PD as the destination postcode.

We have 1,300 parking spaces across seven car parks.

Swanwick railway station is located within a 25 minute walk from Whiteley Shopping.

There is also a taxi rank located at the station.

First Group operate a local service to and from Whiteley (Number 28 & 28A).

The nearest bus stop is located on Whiteley Way by Tesco.
